title: Season V: Finally, FINALLY RIP mandatory ADC/Supp botlane?
body:
Early dragons are no longer the #1 priority always

All champs significantly harder to cheese level 1-2 for a kill. 

New siege-break options and baron buff

Gank-heavy bonuses to smite upgrades

Is this....can this be the time? The time for roaming smite-supports (blitz Leona Alistar) taking a red buff leash and rolling while the jungler focuses on farm? Is it possible that riot isn't lying through their teeth about strategic diversity and we may actually see some?
